hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cat > Dockerfile << EOF FROM codebuddiesdotorg/codebuddies:PR_$PR EOF
hasTag=$(curl https://hub.docker.com/v2/repositories/codebuddiesdotorg/codebuddies/tags/?page_size=9000 | jq ".results[] | select(.name == \"PR_$PR\")") if [ -z "$hasTag" ]; then echo "There is no corresponding Docker Image for that PR."; exit 1; fi
now --token $NOW_TOKEN --name codebuddies-$PR -e MONGO_URL=@mongo_url -e METEOR_SETTINGS=@meteor_settings -e ROOT_URL=https://codebuddies-$PR.now.sh --public URL=$(now ls --token $NOW_TOKEN | grep $PR) RESULT=$(echo "$URL" | sed "s/.*\(codebuddies-$PR-.*\.sh\)\s.*/\1/") now alias --token $NOW_TOKEN $RESULT codebuddies-$PR
